headline: Auxis Named Top FAO Company in Everest Group’s Finance and Accounting Outsourcing (FAO) PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: CHICAGO & FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., October 06, 2025--Auxis, a Latin America nearshore outsourcing pioneer and finance modernization leader, has for the third consecutive year been recognized by Everest Group as a Major Contender in its Finance and Accounting Outsourcing (FAO) PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.
